com.mygdx.game

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the statistics of an agent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistics

        public Statistics(int maxHP,
                  int maxMP,
                  int speed,
                  int strength,
                  int dexterity,
                  int intelligence,
                  int armourVal,
                  int experience,
                  int currentLevel)
        Creates a new Statistics with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        maxHP - the maximum (and initial) number of hitpoints
        maxMP - the maximum (and initial) number of mana points
        speed - the speed stat
        strength - the strength stat
        dexterity - the dexterity stat
        intelligence - the intelligence stat
        armourVal - the defence stat
        experience - the current experience
        currentLevel - the current level

        Empty constructor required for JSON deserialisation to work.
